ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Recommendation to Avoid or Stop Exercise
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to capture that the patient was recommended to avoid or stop exercise.),(Data Element Scope: This data element is intended to capture evidence-based criteria that would exclude the recommendation to engage in exercise or physical activity as a part of cancer care. Using the Quality Data Model, this element would map to the Communication and Intervention categories.),(Inclusion Criteria: Concepts related to recommending a patient avoid or cease exercise regimen.),(Exclusion Criteria: Concepts related to recommending exercise.)
